modName: Veronika the Thief - CBBE UNPB TBBP Standalone
summary:
Add a thief follower, she can be found at the Ragged Flagon - Cistern.
Now standalone with CBBE or UNP Body, Apachii hairs and tatooed body texture.
descriptionHtml:
Check out my other mods [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6886180/?tb=mods&pUp=1]HERE[/url][/u]

Veronika is a cute thief girl living inside the ragged flagon - cistern.
You need to complete the quest "taking care of business" before you can recruit her.
She can be married, and can be stewart of one of your Hearthfire house.

There's a little backstory about her, check her inventory ...

She is a combat thief, using daggers and bow.

She has ligthfoot, silent roll and power shot perks.

She wear clothes, so you can give her any armor you want, but have a custom thieves guild armor in her inventory, that she will equip as soon as you recruit her.

She also own two daggers (from Ghosus Weapon Pack), an orchish bow and 100 orcish arrows.

Your screenshots are welcome !!!

[b][i][color=blue]VERSION[/color] FRANÇAISE [color=red]DISPONIBLE[/color] sur la page des téléchargements.[/i][/b]

And also a fix if you've got the missing hair texture issue (optional files).

There is several versions available :

- Vanilla one, that requires nothing !!!
- Apachii version, that requires Apachii ShyHair v 1.4, or higher. Compatible with any body changer.
- CBBE standalone, with optional BBP or TBBP meshes, for people using custom skeleton like XPMS. Just overwrite Veronika's body files with the one fitting you requirements.
- UNPB standalone, with optional UNPB BBP or TBBP meshes.

And, for people like my friend Ista3, who don't like the Thieves Guild and are using "destroy the guild" mods, there's alternate versions avaible, both UNPB and CBBE, compatibles with (T)BBP optional meshes. Veronika is now an adventurer and is waiting for you at the Bee and Bard inn, on the first floor.
This one has a different custom armor, and vanilla weapons. It's up to you to give her better gear !!

files.name: Veronika - Apachii Hairs version v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Eyes colour has been change, in order to fix the "purple eyes" problem that may occurs.

files.name: Veronika - Vanilla hairs version v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Eyes colour has been change, in order to fix the "purple eyes" problem that may occurs.

files.name: Veronika - Standalone CBBE
files.changelogHtml:
Now standalone with CBBE Body and custom tattooed body. The Ragged Flagon name error has been also fixed. ID have been change so you can test her with deleting the current version, or keep both as twins !
Also add an UNP standalone version.

files.name: Veronika UNP - the Thief
files.changelogHtml:
Now standalone with CBBE Body and custom tattooed body. The Ragged Flagon name error has been also fixed. ID have been change so you can test her with deleting the current version, or keep both as twins !
Also add an UNP standalone version.
